channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Pivotal Container Service (PKS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Pivotal Container Service (PKS)

item.title: CVE-2019-11273|2024-09-16T18:04:10.968Z -- pivotal -- pivotal%20container%20service%20%28pks%29
item.description: Pivotal Container Services (PKS) versions 1.3.x prior to 1.3.7, and versions 1.4.x prior to 1.4.1, contains a vulnerable component which logs the username and password to the billing database. A remote authenticated user with access to those logs may be able to retrieve non-sensitive information.
